# The `GVN.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides the interface for LLVM&#39;s Global Value Numbering pass which eliminates fully redundant instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file provides the interface for LLVM&#39;s Global Value Numbering pass which eliminates fully redundant instructions.

It also does somewhat Ad-Hoc PRE and dead load elimination.
